content.rendered:
Directed by Gunasekhar.

Written by Gunasekhar. Paruchuri Venkateswara Rao. Gopalakrishna Paruchuri. Vipanchi. Rajasimha.

Cast Anushka Shetty(Rudrama Devi). Allu Arjun(Gona Ganna Reddy). Rana Daggubati(Chalukya Veerabhadra). Vikramjeet Virk(Mahadeva Nayakudu). Prakash Raj(Mahamantri Shiva Devayya). Krishnamraju(Ganapathi Deva Chakravarthy). Hamsa Nandini(Madanika). Sreoshi Chatterjee(Leela). Prabha(Somamba).Brahmanandam. Ajay(Prasaditya).M.S. Narayana.Dharmavarapu Subramanyam.Vennela Kishore.Brahmaji . Aditi Chengappa(Ganapamba). Ulka Gupta(Younger Rudrama Devi). Ashok Kumar(Priest). Vinod Kumar(Ganna Reddy’s paternal uncle). Venu Madhav(Tittibi). Nithya Menen(Muktamba (as Nithya Menon)). Adithya Menon(Murari Devudu). Raza Murad(Singanna).Ravi Prakash.Sivaji Raja. Arpit Ranka(Varada Reddy). Raja Ravindra(Anambika’s father). Jayaprakash Reddy(Amba Devudu). Vikram Sahidev((as Vikram Sahadev)). Subbaraya Sarma(Jayapa Naidu). Baba Sehgal(Naga Devudu). Jimmeey Sirole(Rajadu). Suman(Hari Hara Devudu). Catherine Tresa(Anambika)

Language Telugu.

Producers Ayan. Neelima Guna. Ragini Guna. Gunasekhar. Yukthamukhi.

Production Gunaa Teamworks.
